channel.title: Personnes mentionnées on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in Personnes mentionnées on ECTHRwatch

item.title: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission
item.description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Un document important.

item.title: Bureau fédéral d'enquête
item.description: Bureau fédéral d’enquête I am going to seek Victim Assistance and witness protection from the Federal Bureau of Investigation. I am going to explain in further details why later. I also intend to ask for witness protection to the European Court of Human Rights and to the Chinese Central Government. You can read my open letters to the F.B.I. on Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com (non-official website on the F.B.I.).

item.title: Adam Rogalski
item.description: Adam Rogalski Federal Bureau of Investigation (F.B.I.) Attaché juridique-adjoint Mes communications envoyées à Adam Rogalski sont publiées sur le site (Adam-Rogalski.fr.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com)[https://Adam-Rogalski.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com].

item.title: Christopher Asher WRAY
item.description: Christopher Asher WRAY Directeur du Bureau fédéral d’enquête Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For the sake of transparency, open letters to Mr. Wray will be published on Christopher-Asher-Wray.
